name: Leadership
description: Inspires and guides individuals and teams to achieve outcomes; sets direction and cultivates a culture of excellence.

name: Communication
description: Presents information clearly and listens effectively across audiences and channels.

name: Stakeholder Management
description: Identifies stakeholders, analyses needs, and manages expectations to achieve outcomes.

name: Project Management
description: Plans, initiates, executes, and closes projects; manages risks, scope, schedule, and budget.

name: Program Management
description: Leads programs of related projects to deliver strategic outcomes and benefits.

name: Risk Management
description: Identifies, assesses, and mitigates risks across initiatives and operations.

name: Solution Architecture
description: Designs end-to-end solutions aligning business, data, application, and technology.

name: Software Engineering
description: Designs, develops, tests, and maintains software systems following engineering practices.

name: DevOps Engineering
description: Builds CI/CD, automation, and observability to streamline delivery and operations.

name: Cyber Security
description: Protects systems and data; applies security controls, threat modeling, and response.

name: Data Engineering
description: Designs and operates data pipelines, storage, and processing at scale.

name: Data Science
description: Applies statistics and ML to derive insights and predictive models.

name: User Research
description: Understands user needs via qualitative and quantitative research.

name: UX Design
description: Designs user experiences and interfaces grounded in research and accessibility.

name: Product Marketing
description: Positions products, crafts messaging, and drives go-to-market activities.

name: Product Management
description: Discovers problems, defines strategy, prioritizes work, and delivers value.

name: Business Analysis
description: Elicits and documents requirements; aligns solutions to business goals.

name: Cloud Engineering
description: Designs and builds cloud platforms and services; optimizes reliability and cost.

name: Agile Delivery
description: Applies Agile and lean practices for iterative value delivery.

name: MLOps
description: Operationalizes ML models with reproducibility, monitoring, and governance.
